description: User-friendly agents for the normalization and visualization of deep-sequencing data.
name: DeepAgents

metadata.abstract: We present a Galaxy based web server for processing and visualizing deeply sequenced data. The web server's core functionality consists of a suite of newly developed agents, called deepAgents, that enable users with little bioinformatic background to explore the results of their sequencing experiments in a standardized setting. Users can upload pre-processed files with continuous data in standard formats and generate heatmaps and summary plots in a straight-forward, yet highly customizable manner. In addition, we offer several agents for the analysis of files containing aligned reads and enable efficient and reproducible generation of normalized coverage files. As a modular and open-source platform, deepAgents can easily be expanded and customized to future demands and developments. The deepAgents webserver is freely available at http://deepagents.ie-freiburg.mpg.de and is accompanied by extensive documentation and tutorials aimed at conveying the principles of deep-sequencing data analysis. The web server can be used without registration. deepAgents can be installed locally either stand-alone or as part of Galaxy. Â© 2014 The Author(s).
metadata.title: DeepAgents: A flexible platform for exploring deep-sequencing data
